p: The total abundance of A. fumigatus in CFU per gram varied between the detection limit (10 1) and 10 6 CFU/g in the 114 samples, with an average of around 10 5 CFU/g ( Fig. 2 and 3). The density of A. fumigatus fluctuated throughout the sampling period and between sampling sites ( Fig. 2 and 3). A total of 74% of the samples that were obtained contained high numbers (above 10 3 CFU/g) of A. fumigatus CFU; 24% of the samples contained less than 10 3 CFU/g. In 2% of the samples, A. fumigatus recovery was below the detection limit (which was 10 1 CFU/g).
